meanings.sent1: After the party, he was the drunkest person there.
meanings.sent2: She always gets the drunkest at weddings.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the drunkest pirate kept trying to walk the plank.
meanings.sent4: The drunkest sailor on the ship sang sea shanties all night.
meanings.sent5: The drunkest clown stumbled around the circus tent, entertaining everyone.

meanings.sent1: He was the drunkest he had ever been after the pub crawl.
meanings.sent2: The drunkest revelers were dancing wildly at the music festival.
meanings.sent3: The drunkest chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The drunkest explorer lost his way in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The drunkest cowboy rode his horse backwards through town, causing a commotion.
